title: T206 +++ WTTF +++ Southern League ++ Johnson Traded
author: mybuddyinc

posts.post_title: T206 +++ WTTF +++ Southern League ++ Johnson Traded
posts.post_content:
Hello, all you fellow T206 traders !!!!!!!

Looking to do some possible deals with SLs.

Of my 48, I have 38 OMSL and 1 Hindu.  That leaves me with 9 Pied. 350s.

I would like to trade my Pied. 350s for OMSLs (possibly Hindu).

Kind of have a wide variety of conditions :rolleyes:.  Therefore, some I could go down a bit, or some go up a bit.  Corresponding added cash as necessary :).  Raw is what I do, but graded is fine, although I can't see going over a 3.

Here's my list:

Bastian – g/vg
Bay – f
Cranston – ex (probable trim)
Hart, Little Rock – f/g
Hickman – vg+ (fleck paper loss on back)
Mullaney – g
Persons – g
Shaughnessy – f/g (cool “redemption” stamp on back, may be good enough for me)
Violat – g

If you have any OMSLs, let me know.  I can get scans off to you, and go from there.

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott

(Would consider straight out purchase, but seeing what lower end SLs are going for, would keep it under $75)

............. and now for something completely different ;)

Now that Chris gave me a very good deal :) on his posted Johnson/port. SC649, my Pied. 350 is available.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=242426&d=1471895730[/IMG]

It's a good image with obvious condition issues, and would be an easy sell.  But what fun would that be ????  I'd rather trade it for some of the above needed SLs.  Some cash could be added one way or the other.

_______________________

Speaking of SC649s, sitting now at 30/34, only need:

Bates -- vg+ (with ink on back)
Gilbert -- vg+ (solid card)
McIntyre/Brk. -- g/vg
Schlei/catch -- vg/ex (beautiful extra dark coloring)

Any help would be appreciated.  Of course, love to trade for them, condition indicated.


Fun, Fun, Scott :rolleyes:
I've got a few of those you are looking fro, have to unpack from White Plains, let me get you a list on Wednesday.

Johnson was traded to fellow member (now trader !! :)), for a few OMSLs and other great backs.

Also thanks to a few other members (you know who you are, and THANKS !!!!), I'm down to only 9 Pied.350 needing to switch to OMSL.

Any help would be greatly appreciated. ;)

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Fun, fun, Scott :rolleyes:
